title: STEAM Mathematics Learning Activity Design Using Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Customized mathematics education program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can design real-life problem-solving math activities by applying the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Analyze integrated application cases of geometric concepts in VR simulation environments and propose creative solutions
Implement a feedback protocol to improve learning activity designs through peer assessment with 80% accuracy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
